Privacy Policy

Personal data: any Personal information that allows to a third party to identify an individual (data subject) directly or indirectly. Some of this information will identify the individual directly, for example, if the name and e-mail address are specified. It is also possible to identify an individual indirectly by references to the information in which the name is not specified, for example, if there the title of position and the employer are indicated, or using a different identifier, such as an IP address.
